fileDesc.editionStmt:
Second Draft 1963
Edited by Camila Oliveira

availability.p: This work is the property of the University of Bologna. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text.

body.l: It was a queer, sultry summer, the summer they electrocuted
the Rosenbergs, and I didn't know what I was doing in New York.
I'm stupide about executions. The idea of being electrocuted
makes me sick, I can't see it that's all there was to read
